text: My dog has been eating this stuff for about eight years.  The dog likes it and the the dog is healthy, so I figure the food must be okay.  The only problem I have with this brand of food is the "Healty Weight" formula.  When our dog was a bit over-weight, I bought that and the dog just went wacky until I gave it more to eat.  It seemed like the Healthy Weight formula was just puffed up regular stuff.  So I just cut back on the regular stuff instead and the dog was fine.  So other than the Healthy Weight formula of this brand of dog food, I have no problem with it.
